t: Praise*pn the Lord.*s Blessed*pn are those who fear the Lord,*s who*ld find great delight in his commands.
Their*pn children will be mighty in the land; the*ld generation of the upright will be blessed.
Wealth*ln and riches are in their houses, and*ld their righteousness endures forever.
Even*ln in darkness light dawns for the upright, for*ld those who are gracious and compassionate and righteous.
Good*ln will come to those who are generous and lend freely, who*ld conduct their affairs with justice.
Surely*pn the righteous will never be shaken; they*ld will be remembered forever.
They*ln will have no fear of bad news; their*ld hearts are steadfast, trusting in the Lord.*s
Their*ln hearts are secure, they will have no fear; in*ld the end they will look in triumph on their foes.
They*ln have freely scattered their gifts to the poor, their*ld righteousness endures forever; their*ld horn will be lifted high in honor.
The*pn wicked will see and be vexed, they*ld will gnash their teeth and waste away; the*ld longings of the wicked will come to nothing.
